name: SAA Flight Training
about: SAA Flight Training, located at Gillespie Field in El Cajon, California, is a reputable flight school offering a comprehensive range of aviation training programs. We provide certifications in Private Pilot, Night Rating, Commercial Pilot, Flight Instructor, and Instrument Rating. Our training includes additional ground school and seminars to ensure thorough preparation for aspiring pilots. With a focus on safety and excellence, SAA Flight Training is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities make us an ideal choice for those seeking a career in aviation. We are committed to providing top-quality training to help our students succeed in the skies.
services:
["Computerized Testing
Examiner
Ground School
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
